faqs.question: What are FOB and CIF terms?
faqs.answer:
We operate under two main international trade terms:

• FOB (Free on Board): We handle goods until loaded on the vessel at the port of shipment. You control freight and insurance from there. Ideal for experienced importers.

• CIF (Cost, Insurance, and Freight): We manage costs, insurance, and freight to your destination port. Perfect for a hassle-free, full-service experience.

Visit our Business Models page for detailed information about our partnership options.

faqs.question: What surfaces can I install PVC products on?
faqs.answer:
Our products install on clean, dry, flat surfaces including:

• Drywall, concrete, plywood (for wall installations with PEGATEC adhesive)
• Structural framing (for ceilings, roofing, facades with mechanical fastening)
• Level subfloors (for SPC flooring with click-lock system)

Each product comes with detailed installation instructions. Professional installation is recommended for roofing and exterior facades.

faqs.question: Do I need a professional installer?
faqs.answer:
Installation requirements depend on the product:

• DIY-Friendly: SPC flooring, self-adhesive wall panels, some laminates
• Professional Recommended: Roofing, exterior facades, structural ceiling systems
• Safety First: Any installation above ground level or on roofs requires professional installation for safety and warranty compliance

We provide installation guides and video tutorials for all our products. Contact us for contractor referrals in your area.

faqs.question: How do I clean and maintain PVC products?
faqs.answer:
Our products require minimal maintenance:

• Regular Cleaning: Wipe with damp cloth and mild soap
• Stain Removal: Use neutral detergent, avoid abrasive cleaners
• No Special Treatment: No waxing, sealing, or refinishing needed
• Longevity: Products maintain appearance with minimal care for decades

This is one of the main advantages of PVC and WPC materials - they look great with minimal effort!

faqs.question: Are these products suitable for wet areas?
faqs.answer:
Yes! All our products are 100% waterproof, making them perfect for:

• Bathrooms (walls, floors, ceilings)
• Kitchens (backsplashes, walls, floors)
• Pool areas (decking, walls, outdoor spaces)
• Laundry rooms
• Commercial wet areas (restaurants, hotels, spas)

Unlike traditional materials, our PVC and WPC products will never rot, rust, or suffer moisture damage.

faqs.question: What if I find defects after receiving my order?
faqs.answer:
Important warranty guidelines:

• Inspect ALL products upon delivery before signing receipt
• Report missing items or shipping damage immediately
• Do NOT install products with visible defects
• Contact sales team immediately if defects are found
• Warranty excludes defects visible before installation
• Follow technical datasheets for proper use and installation

We conduct quality audits at source (China and LATAM) to minimize defects, but please inspect upon delivery.

faqs.question: How does container shipping work?
faqs.answer:
Our platform is designed for container-based shipping:

1. Create Container: Define container specifications and capacity
2. Fill with Products: Add products based on dimensions and volume
3. Optimize Loading: Our system helps maximize container utilization
4. Ship with Confidence: Know exactly how full each container is

This approach reduces waste, optimizes space, and simplifies logistics. Perfect for bulk orders and international shipping.
